name: ESC
purpose: If the user presses the ESC key at a message and the appropriate ESC traps are set to ignore then the internal esc_pressed flag is set to 1. You can test for that flag being set using this function.
return_type: L If the user pressed the ESC key this will be .T..
comments: Once this flag is checked it will be reset to .F.. It is also cleared before the next MESSAGE or ENTER command.
